subTitle.en: To activate your EMEAT account, please use the verification code below.

message.en: Once your account is verified, you'll be able to sign in to our website or application using your account information.

message1.en: Please use the verification code below to reset the password for your client account at EMEAT. If you did not request a new password, you can safely delete this email.

message2.es: Haz clic en el siguiente botón para continuar.
message2.en: If you did not request a new password, you can safely delete this email.

message1.en: Please use the code below to verify your email for your EMEAT account.

bulletinText.es: You are only receiving pricing data for a limited number of Sub-Primals/Items because you have not personalized your choices yet. Please go to EMEAT’s Personalization menu to make your selections.
bulletinText.en: You are only receiving pricing data for a limited number of Sub-Primals/Items because you have not personalized your choices yet. Please go to EMEAT’s Personalization menu to make your selections.

bulletinSubmitText.es: You are receiving the pricing data for the Sub-Primals/Items that you personalized. If you want to make changes to your personalization, please go to EMEAT’s Personalization menu to make your selections.
bulletinSubmitText.en: You are receiving the pricing data for the Sub-Primals/Items that you personalized. If you want to make changes to your personalization, please go to EMEAT Personalization menu to make your selections.

bulletinBottomText.es: The full price report can be found on our website.
bulletinBottomText.en: The full price report can be found on our website.
